runs.comm: on target right away, pitches on a good length outside off stump and Ouma decides to let it go, surely he won't let too many pass

bowled him! Fuller length pitches just outside off stump and angles into the right-hander, Ouma tries to play an expansive cover drive and the ball bursts through the gap between bat and pad, it hits the elbow and rattles the stumps, awesome start from Bond
full ball slanting into middle stump, Mishra tries to flick but doesn't connect
caught! Good length outside the off stump, Mishra cuts and hits it straight to Vincent at point, Kenya are two down in the first over
Tikolo doesn't offer a shot and gets hit on the pad just outside off stump, loud shout for lbw but it was too high

disaster for Kenya, Gillespie pitches just short of a length and the ball swings back into Obuya from outside off stump, the ball arrives quicker than Obuya expects and he gets pushed back in his crease, he loses balance and treads on his stumps
lots of swing, that was full and swinging into Obuya who played back in his crease and got beaten
shorter in length and wider outside the off stump, Obuya tries to cut on the back foot and gets beaten
massive cheer from the crowd as Obuya opens the face and plays a full ball that swings into him behind point for  a single

and another one goes, Gillespie keeps it full and the ball swings into Tikolo who hardly moves his feet while trying to flick and gets hit flush on the pad, Billy Doctrove takes a moment and then raises the finger
full ball on off stump, driven on the up to cover, the crowd think it's a catch but that was hit hard into the ground
full ball outside the off stump, Obuya tries to drive and get beaten by the pace of Bond
superb ball, it pitches on off stump and swings back into Obuya and cuts him in half
full length delivery on off and middle stump, driven to mid-on for a quick single
good length delivery pitches on off stump and swings into Odoyo's pads, he tries to flick but is very late on the shot
massive appeal for lbw, good length ball pitches on a good length and hits Odoyo on off stump, perhaps there was an inside edge on that one
full delivery wider outside the off stump, Odoyo reaches out for it and drives but is no where near the ball
short of a length delivery pitches on off and middle and cuts Obuya in half
short of a length once again, Obuya waits on the back foot and defends towards the off side
slightly fuller outside off stump, Obuya waits on the back foot and plays the square drive but cannot beat Vincent at point
that's far too wide outside the off stump, Doctrove signals the first extra of the day
Obuya steps down the pitch and drives a full ball between extra cover and mid-off, Vettori gives chase and keeps the batsmen down to two
the ball is swinging a fair bit and moving off the pitch as well, this one swings from outside off and cuts into the right-hander, hitting him on the pad
defended off the back foot to the off side
short ball but Bond strays down leg side and concedes a wide
Odoyo gives Bond the charge but misses the drive, he gets an inside edge that rolls past his stumps
outstanding stuff from Bond, he pitches the ball on a perfect length outside off stump, the batsman has no room or length to work with and the ball beats the outside edge of his forward defence
Bond lets loose a full toss outside off stump, Odoyo reaches out for it and drives through extra cover for four, that's the first loose ball of the day and the first boundary as well
good length delivery outside off stump, left alone by the batsman
he lets another one go outside off stump, that's very rare to see in the Twenty20 format
Odoyo pushes hard at one outside the off stump, the ball hits the inside edge and rolls down towards fine leg for a single
too full outside the off stump, Odoyo leans forward and drives through point for the second boundary of the innings
he shortens his length a bit outside the off stump, Odoyo moves on to the front foot and lets it go through to McCullum
Odoyo gives Oram the charge, Oram sees him coming and bangs it in short, Odoyo manages to pull the ball over midwicket's head but he hasn't timed it well at all
once again Odoyo just about manages to clear midwicket with a mis-timed flick
Oram strays down leg side this time, wide called
full ball, Oram was aiming for the blockhole and nearly found it, well dug out by the batsman
over-pitched once again on off stump, Obuya drives superbly through extra cover for another boundary, twelve runs off the over, the best of the innings
he bangs it short first up, Odoyo tries to pull but gets beaten
good length ball on off stump, Odoyo leans forward and drives to cover point
a fraction too full from Bond, Odoyo uses the room outside off stump to play a lofted drive over cover, he hasn't timed it well but the outfield is quick enough for the ball to reach the boundary
Bond returns to his impeccable line and length on off stump, defended on the front foot
bowled short on middle and leg stump, the ball hits Odoyo's thigh and flies down leg side, McCullum flies - goalkeeper style- to his left and pulls off an acrobatic save
Odoyo tries to pull one that's not that short and doesn't make proper contact
angled into the pads, Odoyo misses the flick and gets a leg bye towards midwicket
Oram pitches the ball on a good length outside off stump, Obuya opens the face and angles it down towards the third-man boundary
just short of a length on off stump, Obuya pulls through midwicket
pushed down the ground towards long on for a single
slower ball has Odoyo completely foxed, he hangs his bat out and nearly chips it back to Oram
full ball on middle and leg, flicked through midwicket for another single
full ball outside off stump, Odoyo tries to drive through the off side but gets beaten
full delivery outside off, driven off the front foot to point
caught! Odoyo tries to pull a ball from outside off stump, it isn't that short either and the top edge lobs up towards mid-off where Ross Taylor takes a simple catch
good length delivery pitches on off stump and angles into Odhiambo who drives towards the off side on the front foot
Odhiambo stands in his crease and tries to smash a good-length ball down the ground with a flat bat, he ends up mis-hitting it towards cover
nicely flighted on off stump, Obuya steps down the track and defends
Obuya tries to cut a quicker ball outside off stump but doesn't make proper contact
Obuya gives Vettori the charge once again but doesn't get to the pitch of the ball, he has to defend it in the end
turned off the pads behind square for a single
Vettori flights it outside the off stump, Odhiambo tries to loft him down the ground but misses
defended back to the bowler
Martin pitches it full and driven to cover
pitched just outside the off stump, in the length to drive square, pushed to point
Martin teases him with a short one, Odhiambo pulls but mistimes it, falls in the midwicket region
and Martin strikes with a short one, Odhiambo attempts another pull over midwicket, plays too early, gets a top edge and the ball goes down Ross Taylor's throat as short cover
pacy delivery outside off stump, Obanda lets it go
Martin drags the length a little fuller outside off, tempts him to drive square, beaten
tossed on leg, swept, the ball falls short of the fielder at deep square leg
on off stump and big turn, nearly gets the edge
pushed back to the bowler
short of a length, pushed to the on side
the wheels are falling fast, tossed up wide outside leg stump, Obuya takes a few paces forward, misses, neat stumping down the leg side, wide called
pushed in flat on off, defended on the front foot, McCullum gathers it and back flicks the ball
pushed on middle and leg, catches him on the front pad, half-hearted appeal by McCullum
pitched on off, Obanda swings and the ball beats mid-off, perhaps the first misfield we've seen , Bond the culprit
banged on the off stump, left alone
Martin lands that on a good length outside off, Obanda lets it go wisely
banged in shorter, Obanda steps down and swings wildly, misses it altogether, the ball sails over his head, wide called
fuller, close to yorker length, the ball gets the under-edge and clips the pad, rolls to the off side
another yorker length ball on off stump, squeezed out to third man
pitched wide outside off, Kamande goes for a wild slash over point, lucky not to get an edge, beaten
tossed on off stump, defended confidently off the front foot
Vettori strikes, tossed on off stump, Obanda tries to leave it, in a split second changes his mind, plays at it, the ball gets the underedge of his bat and rolls on to the stumps
defended to the on side
flighted on middle, hoicked to the vacant mid-on region
tossed on off, Kamande nearly scoops it back to Vettori, strikes it hard and the ball races to long-off
fired away on off stump, pushed to third man, mixup with the running
fuller on off stump, drilled to cover

dug in short, Bhudia goes for the hook, takes his eyes off it, gets hit on the helmet, the ball rolls to the off side, they go for a run, Bhudia makes it, McCullum's throw was a little wide of the stumps
overpitched outside off, driven to deep cover, sliding stop saves a few runs
attempted yorker, turns to a ,low full toss, played to the off side
the first of the match! another low full toss, Bhudia gives room and scoops it over deep point
tossed on middle and leg, Kamanda slog sweeps that over midwicket
another slog sweep, get the top edge and the ball falls safely between slip and point, wierd shot that
fired in fast and flat on off stump, played with soft hands to the off side and the batsmen set off fast
fired in on a yorker length outside off, dug out to point, good timing results in that beating the fielder, the sweeper cuts it off
full, on off stump, driven to cover
dug in short on off stump, Kamande walks across his stumps, attempts a hook, misses, wide called
timber! high full toss on middle, Kamande steps down and tries to whack it over midwicket, misses it completely and Gillespie removes the middle stump, goes back a few yards
another clean-up job by Gillespie, high full toss aimed at leg stump, Ongondo gives room, exposes his stumps, the ball takes out the leg stump this time
